original_title: Virgin Tales 2: Revenge Of The Virgins
overview: Virgin Tales 2 DVD provides a glimpse into the lives of some of your favorite former virgins as they plot to deflower other hot teens. They discover the allure of making it with a virgin adds much more spice to the already hot aspect of "doing the nasty" condom-free. Experience the heat, passion and semi-awkwardness than only horned up teen studs can provide!
title: Virgin Tales 2: Revenge Of The Virgins
